familiarity.translation[0].definitions[0: a good knowledge of a particular subject or place
In fact his familiarity with the Bronx was pretty limited.
familiarity.translation[0].definitions[1: the quality of being well-known to you
I miss the familiarity of home.
familiarity.translation[0].definitions[2: a relaxed way of speaking to someone or behaving with someone
He treated her with the easy familiarity of an equal.
